#summary The sample code for the client

#include <stdlib.h><br>
#include <stdio.h><br>
#include <string.h><br>
#include "interface.h"<br>

int main()<br>
{<br>
    conn * connection;<br>
	

    if(cli_connection("127.0.0.1", 1959, &connection))<br>
    {<br>
        char resp[256], cmd[256];<br>
        int i, len;<br><br>
        memset(resp, 0, 256);<br>
        sprintf(cmd, "create table gu(id1 varchar, id2 int, id3 varchar)");<br>
        cli_commit(connection, cmd, resp, &len);<br>
        printf("ret: %s\n", resp);<br><br>
        for(i = 0; i < 20000; i ++)<br>
        {<br>
            memset(resp, 0, 256);<br>
            memset(cmd, 0, 256);<br>
            sprintf(cmd, "insert into gu(gggg%d, %d, bbbb%d)", i, i, i);<br>
            cli_commit(connection, cmd, resp, &len);<br>
            printf("cmd: %s, ret(%d): %s\n", cmd, len, resp);
        }<br><br>
        for(i = 0; i < 200; i ++)<br>
        {<br>
            memset(resp, 0, 256);<br>
            memset(cmd, 0, 256);<br>
            sprintf(cmd, "select gu(gggg%d)", i*100);<br>
            cli_commit(connection, cmd, resp, &len);<br>
            resp[len] = '\0';<br>
        }<br><br>
        cli_exit(connection);<br>
    }<br>

    return 0;<br>
}<br>
